name: Mace Mayhem
description:
WASD or Arrows to move

Left/Right click to change mace length

Swing your mace like a madman in this gladiatoral fight to the death!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together",  this game fits this theme as the players movements affect the mace's movement. The mace cannot be moved independantly and is attatched/reliant on the player and their fates are thus "Joined Together".

Thanks to one of my friends for the music! You know who you are :)

Sorry about the UI and the game fitting the screen badly. I had major issues with exporting from unity and applying the used aspect ratio in Itch.io, if anyone knows anything to help with this then it will be grately aprecciated :)
